price: (Nyankopͻn) no a, Ɔbͻ wͻn akͻnhoma fri ͻkͻm mu, na Ɔma wͻn akomatͻyamu firi ehuu mu no.
arabic: ٱلَّذِيٓ أَطۡعَمَهُم مِّن جُوعٖ وَءَامَنَهُم مِّنۡ خَوۡفِۭ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: alladhī aṭʿamahum min jūʿin waāmanahum min khawfin
